files.title: 6.2.8.7.1.2. Edge Data
files.summary: ###### 6.2.8.7.1.2. Edge Data[](#edge-data "Permalink to this headline")  CUDA 12.3 introduced edge data on CUDA Graphs. Edge data modifies a dependency specified by an edge and consists of three par...
